exercises.name: FARTLEK: Build Speed
exercises.instruction: Run with alternating fast and slow sections. For example, run hard for 6 minutes, then jog for 4 minutes, repeated for a total of 60 minutes.

exercises.name: FARTLEK: Steady
exercises.instruction: Run with alternating fast and slow sections. For example, do a steady jog for 6 minutes, then walk briskly for 4 minutes, repeated for a total of 60 minutes.

exercises.name: Tempo
exercises.instruction: Run at a challenging but sustainable pace for the entire duration, typically maintaining a pace slightly faster than your 5K race pace.
